name: Carbon Lapp Knife 240
lead: The long-awaited Lapp knife with a carbon steel blade
description: Experience the Spark of the North! Fans of Marttiini throughout the world have been requesting a Lapp knife with a carbon steel blade. We listened – and proudly present the Carbon Lapp Knife 240.
The Carbon Lapp Knife 240 is a stunningly beautiful knife with
And, with regular maintenance, this knife will stay rust-free and serve you for years to come.

For the handle material, we chose beautiful curly birch to contrast the dark carbon steel. For extra protection, a layer of see-through wax was added. The elegant sheath made of light brown leather seals the deal.

name: Lynx Black Edition
lead: Classic Lynx knife with an updated modern black look
description: The forged carbon steel blade is perfect for carving; it is also easy to sharpen to its original sharpness.

name: Kierinki
description: Kierinki is a knife designed by our skilled carpenter, showcasing the beauty of craftsmanship. Its handle combines thermally treated birch and curly birch, seamlessly complementing each other. The blade is made of wavy carbon steel, mimicking the unique marks of hand forging. The genuine brown sheath is adorned with beautiful gold foil detailing, depicting the intricacies of the carbon steel.

This exquisite piece of craftsmanship is named after the hometown of our founder, Janne Marttiini, Kierinki. The village still houses the first workshop where Janne began honing his blacksmithing skills. Kierinki is suitable for all users and makes an excellent gift. It is versatile and can be used for hunting, fishing, and all kinds of outdoor activities.

name: Lynx 134
description: The 134 Lynx knife combines practical features with stunning details. This impressive knife is perfect for any outdoors person or
The handle is made of waxed curly birch – the cast finger guard adds a hint of luxury. The blade is made of practical stainless chrome steel. A durable and beautiful leather sheath is included.
The same knife is available also with a different sheath design :

properties.name: Handle material
properties.value: Curly birch, waxed, finger guard of cast

name: Lynx Forged
lead: The traditional Lynx Knife with a forged steel blade
description: The blade is made of carbon steel and is perfect for carving; it is also easy to sharpen to its original sharpness. The handle is beautifully waxed curly birch, adding elegance and durability to the knife. The sheath is a traditional Ilves sheath made from genuine vegetable-tanned leather. This knife is an excellent choice for both carving and hiking.

name: Lapp knife 230
description: The Lapp knife 230 is one of Marttiini's most popular knives and continues to maintain its place at the top of the sales ratings after many years of continuous production. The knife is excellent for hikers and hunters who are active knife users, and it also makes an ideal present.
The stainless chrome steel blade and the sheath depict beautiful traditional themes from Lapland.

name: Lapp knife 235
description: Traditionally finger guards are not part of Scandinavian knife culture, but in Central Europe for example, finger guards are commonly fitted to knives. A finger guard provides more safety for the knife user. For those who are a little less accustomed to using knives a model with a finger guard is especially justified. You can get a good grip of the knife and your hand will not slip on to the blade even in wet or cold conditions.

This Lapp knife is an excellent general knife suitable for both outdoors and hunting. The stainless chrome steel blade and the sheath depict traditional themes from Lapland. The sheath also features a secure snap closure.

name: Lapp knife 240
description: The Lapp knife 240 is one of Marttiini's most popular knives and continues to maintain its place at the top of the sales ratings after many years of continuous production. The knife is excellent for hikers and hunters who are active knife users, and it also makes an ideal present or souvenir from a trip to Finland.
The stainless chrome steel blade features a beautiful etched engraving depicting a Lappish theme, whilst the pattern on the sheath also reflects a strong Lappish heritage.

name: Lapp knife 280
lead: An excellent gift for those who already have it all
description: This impressive knife is almost half a meter long. The blade and the sheath are decorated with a traditional themes and scenery from Lapland. This knife is surely one to be noticed!
As Crocodile Dundee said:

name: Lynx 121
description: This handy general purpose knife is especially suitable for carving dried salted meat and for the precise cutting of wood. The knife features an easy to maintain stainless chrome steel blade and a leather sheath in the traditional style.

name: Lynx 129
description: This traditional knife, designed by the founder of Marttiini, is an excellent general purpose knife for all outdoor activities. The sharpness of the Lynx blade is legendary, the handle is of beautiful Finnish birch.
The design and decorations on the sheath reflect Marttiini's strong Lappish traditions.

name: Lynx 131
description: This knife has remained in the Marttiini range almost continuously since the company was formed in 1928. The years have not reduced its popularity as the king of general purpose knives. This knife continues to be one of Marttiini's best selling knives.

A traditional curly birch handle combined with the legendary sharp Lynx blade with the characteristic design feature of the slightly upturned blade tip. The design and decorations on the sheath also reflect our strong northern roots.
An excellent general purpose knife for all outdoor activities!

name: Lynx 132
description: The most traditional Marttiini knife with a beautiful sheath.

The leather tassel at the tip of the sheath depicts the tuft of hair on the tip of the ears of a lynx. It said to frighten away the bad spirits so that the knife will be used only for peaceful purposes.

name: Lynx 138
description: This Lynx knife has 13 cm blade - the blade also features the traditional "blood groove", which reduces suction when carving meat. Leather sheath is supplied with a tightening strap.

name: Lynx 139
description: This knife has a 13 cm long blade of stainless chrome steel featuring the traditional upturned point. The handle is of curly birch, and the leather sheath features traditional Lappish scenes.

name: Lapp Knife Antler
description: The handle of this traditional Lapp knife, also known as the leuku knife, combines Finnish curly birch with reindeer antler bone. The stainless chrome steel blade has a beautiful etched engraving with a Lappish theme. The leather sheath also reflects traditional Arctic patterns.
This leuku knife is an excellent gift idea for all those who have lost their hearts to northern nature!

properties.name: Handle material
properties.value: Finnish curly birch & reindeer antler bone

name: Golden Lynx
description: The Golden Lynx knife gets its name from its golden-colored bolster, which connects the light curly birch handle and the stainless steel blade. The knife offers an excellent grip, and the finger guard bolster adds extra safety for the user. The blade features the typical Ilves hook, making it easy to lift a coffee pot from the campfire. The light leather sheath is adorned with old patterns from Marttiini’s early days, which were hand-pressed at the time. This beautiful sheath is available only for the Golden Lynx model. It is safe to use even when your hands are wet or slippery.

name: Taiga Lapp Knife
description: Taiga, or the vast arctic forest zone, is a popular hiking area where a knife is handy to have. The Taiga Lapp Knife is a special knife that combines a beautiful two-tone birch handle, reflecting the diverse forest of the taiga, with a stainless chrome blade featuring an engraved taiga landscape. The knife also includes a genuine vegetable-tanned leather sheath.
The Taiga Lapp Knife is produced in limited quantities and is sold exclusively in Marttiini's stores and online shop.

name: Witch's Tooth
description: According to old beliefs, the rattle made of reindeer antler at the end of the handle keeps the evil spirits at bay so that the user of the knife may eat in peace. A legend says that this knife model belonged to an old witch, who used it to carve thin slices of dried meat.
The combination of curly birch and reindeer antler in the handle turn this knife into a true gem.

name: Scout's Knife
description: A knife is an essential part of every scout’s gear. The Marttiini Scout Knife has been a reliable companion for decades. The double-sided finger guard enhances user safety. The blade is made of easy-to-maintain chrome steel. The sheath with a snap closure features an embossed scout emblem, giving the knife a traditional look. This knife is an excellent general-purpose knife for young users, as it allows them to safely practice their knife-handling skills.

name: Aapa
lead: The characteristics of two strong traditional knives combined into one
description: The bold Aapa knife embodies the harsh atmosphere of the Finnish swamp landscape. The model combines the typical characteristics of two strong traditional knives: the blade of a classic Lapp knife and the handle of a Lynx knife. The blade is made of forged carbon steel. The handle is an earthy mix of curly birch waxed in a tar tone and reindeer antler bone. The new sheath type has a wider holster.

properties.name: Handle material
properties.value: colour-waxed curly birch, reindeer antler bone, protective oil

name: Deluxe Junior
lead: Deluxe Junior is the ideal choice for a safe first knife.
description: The ideal gift for a child who wants to learn wilderness skills and how to use a knife. The Deluxe Junior is a great choice as a first knife: it’s a proper, stylish knife with a number of added safety features.

The rounded tip protects against puncture wounds. The handle, made of heat-treated birch, is durable and the size is suitable for a child’s hand. The handle ensures a firm grip and the finger guard prevents fingers from slipping onto the blade.
The knife blade is made of easy-care, stainless steel. Naturally, a proper knife comes with a proper leather sheath.
The Deluxe Junior is a knife developed jointly by Partioaitta and Marttiini and is only available from Partioaitta and Marttiini.

name: Martef Skinning Hook
description: The dirt and moisture repelling Martef coating reduces friction to almost zero whilst protecting the blade against corrosion. Due to the coating the blade moves extremely smoothly through cut meat or fish, and cleaning the blade after use is extremely easy.

is an excellent tool for opening deer. The hook at the back of the knife helps to open the animal without touching internal organs, whilst the round shape of the blade ensures that the hide comes away cleanly and intact. Hook is not suitable for cutting bones. The hook can be sharpened with a pen type sharpener (such as the

The orange rubber handle and finger guard ensure user comfort and safety. Due to the sharpening angle of the stainless chrome steel blade, the knife can be used as a normal knife. A true multi-purpose knife for hunters.

name: Condor Filleting Knife 19
description: The flexible and extremely sharp stainless steel blade ensures clean-cut fillets. This size of blade is best suited for processing fish of about 2-3 kg.
Many other kitchen jobs such as slicing tomato become easy with this knife. The filleting knife is supplied with a black leather sheath.
We recommend hand wash.

name: Handy
description: In the 1970s almost every household in Finland had the Handy knife. It was a truly general purpose knife used for peeling potatoes as well as carving wood.

The shortish blade of this knife is practical for jobs that require precision. In this updated model the traditional blade design is combined with a beautiful curly birch handle. The Handy comes with a stylish leather sheath.

name: Eagle Knife
description: Sharp and reliable, designed for daily use and built to last a lifetime. That is why the Eagle Knife is a timeless and respected gift item.

Kotkapuukko was the first product in Marttiini’s range of animal themed knives, and it remains one of our most popular models. The eagle head pommel was designed by the famous jewelry designer Jorma Laine in the mid-1970s and it quickly became a success, leading to the production of other knives with brass bolsters.

In many cultures, the eagle symbolizes strength, freedom, and keen vision. It is often associated with courage and leadership. For example, in ancient Rome, the eagle was the symbol of the Roman Empire, and in the United States, the bald eagle represents freedom and independence.

The versatile Eagle Knife is a reliable knife fit for both outdoor enthusiasts and collectors. The stainless steel blade (1.4034, HRC 53,5-55) is versatile, while the heat-treated curly birch handle's wax coating ensures durability for years.
Every Eagle Knife is delivered in an elegant wooden box.

properties.name: Handle material
properties.value: Heat treated curly birch, waxed, cast ferrules

name: Sharpening Stone (leather sheath)
description: The main minerals are quartz, feldspar and mica. The sharpener also includes a groove for sharpening hooks. The sharpening stone is in a handy leather sheath.

name: Diamond Sharpening Steel
description: The diamond particles in the sharpener make sharpening of a knife simple and easy. With diamond coated sharpeners you can sharpen the hardest blades, such as stainless chrome steel.
A practical hanging loop is located at the end of the handle. Wash and dry the sharpener after use.

name: Sharpening steel
description: Fitted with a practical hanging loop at the end of the handle. Wash and dry the sharpener after use.

name: Diamond sharpener Pen
description: With the diamond coated sharpener you can sharpen harder blade materials such as stainless chrome steel.

This sharpener design is especially suitable for filleting knives and kitchen knives, but it is also used for for ice augers, skinning knives and gutting hooks. The sharpener also includes a sharpening groove for hooks.

This small-size sharpener is easy to carry with you, and the actual sharpener is stored inside a case after use. A handy pocket clip makes sure that the sharpener stays in the pocket. Use water while sharpening, then wash and dry the sharpener after use.

name: Diamond Sharpener Flat
description: This sharpener is especially suitable for sharpening knives. The sharpener has two surfaces with different grit grades: first the blade is sharpened with circular movements on the rougher side, after which the blade edge is finished on the finer side by removing the circular marks.
The sharpener also includes a groove for sharpening hooks. The roughened handle gives you a good grip.
Use water while sharpening, then wash and dry the sharpener after use.

name: Diamond sharpener Oval
description: The oval shape of this sharpener is best for sharpening products that have a curving blade, such as skinning knives, augers, scythes and sickles. The sharpener is also excellent for sharpening filleting knives and kitchen knives.

The sharpener consists of two surfaces with different grit grades: first the blade is sharpened with circular movements on the rougher side, after which the blade edge is finished on the finer side by removing the circular marks. The sharpener also includes a groove for sharpening hooks. The roughened handle gives you a good grip.
Use water while sharpening, then wash and dry the sharpener after use.

name: Enamel mug, 3,7 dl, white
description: A durable and practical enamel mug with a fresh and modern look, made in collaboration with Finnish design company Muurla.
This enamel mug is the perfect companion for your outdoor adventures – it is light-weight and easy to keep clean.
The mug carries a carbon steel core, with a double coating of enamel. The rim is fully rounded for your comfort.
Capacity 3.7dl. Dishwasher safe. Do not put in a microwave oven.

name: Marttiini Tote Bag
lead: Durable Marttiini tote bag made of recycled cotton
description: The tote bag is made of sturdy material and is comfortable to use. The tote bag will hold everything you need in your daily life – including your laptop. The neat tote bag, equipped with the Marttiini logo, looks stylish on your shoulder.
The light tote bag can be folded into a small square, making it easy to keep with you as a shopping bag or a backup bag when travelling.
The tote bag is made of 100% recycled materials. If necessary, you can handwash the bag in lukewarm water.

name: Fire stick
description: If your matches get wet or you run out of lighter fluid, you can always get a fire going with it. Our fire stick provides a hot spark even in the most severe weather conditions.

Just pull the striker or the back of your knife firmly down the length of the stick and direct the sparks towards you tinder. Any dry material like wood chips and moss will do the trick. Enjoy your campfire!
Total length: 10 cm
Total weight: 35g
Lanyard: brown leather

name: Tweezers for fish bones
description: The tweezers are designed to fit well in your hand. The inner surface of the tweezers is grooved to ensure a firm grip on the slippery surface of fish bones. The tweezers are made of stainless steel.

name: Leather Sheath S
lead: This leather sheath is a perfect protective covering for your folding knives.
description: The leather sheath ensures that your folding knife travels with you safely and comfortably. The sheath has a belt loop for easy carrying. Genuine leather is extremely durable and easy to take care of.
Cognac leather is a classic and elegant choice. Brass snap and a stamped logo add the finishing touch to this fine sheath.

name: Classic Filleting Knife 10
description: This model has been in production since the late 1960s and has been exported around the world for more than 50 years. With the superior finished, sharp and flexible stainless chrome steel blade it only takes a moment to make beautiful fish fillets.
The mini filleting knife is excellent for processing smaller fish like trout and perch. A traditional leather sheath in a natural colour completes the package.
We recommend hand wash.

name: Fishermans knife Condor
description: The serrated edge on the back of the stainless steel blade makes the removal of fish scales easy.

The blade of the fisherman's knife is sharpened just like a normal Marttiini knife, therefore you can use this knife not only for processing fish but also for many jobs around the house or camp. The textured rubber handle and the finger guard ensure a firm grip of the knife even in cold and wet conditions.
The knife is supplied with a black leather sheath.

name: Condor Fish Fork (plastic sheath)
description: The fork proves its worth especially when removing the skin from a fish fillet. It provides you with a good grip of the fish or fillet without you having to worry that the knife will slip on to your fingers.
The Condor fillet fork has a normal knife handle to enable you to get the best possible grip. This fork is supplied with a plastic sheath.
We recommend hand wash.

name: Fish Cleaner
description: The fish cleaner is a very handy tool. The curved blade makes it easy to open up the fish, while the serrated edge comes in handy for scaling.
With the metal scoop at the end of the handle removing the intestines is clean and fast. The blade is protected by a plastic shield.

The blade of the fisherman's knife is sharpened just like a normal Marttiini knife, therefore you can use this knife not only for processing fish but also for many jobs around the house or camp. name: Salmon Filleting Knife
lead: From wild waters to perfect cuts
description: The Kojamo is no ordinary salmon. He’s the big, hooked-jawed old male—the king of Finland’s wild rivers. Known for his strength, beauty, and legendary glow (they say his scales shine brighter than the stars), Kojamo has ruled the northern waters for generations. Marttiini created Salmon Filleting Knife as a tribute to this mighty fish.

Sharp, flexible, and built to last—this knife makes filleting effortless anywhere, from lakeside to kitchen. With a durable heat-treated curly birch handle, cast ferrules and elegant gift box, it’s made for both collectors and everyday anglers.

properties.name: Handle material
properties.value: Finnish heat-treated curly birch, waxed, cust ferrules

name: Järvi Annual Knife 2026
lead: The theme of Marttiini’s 2026 Annual Knife draws its inspiration from Finland, also known as “The Land of a Thousand Lakes.”
description: The name Järvi – meaning “lake” in Finnish – captures Finland’s deep connection with its waters. The knife’s design reflects the tranquillity of the country’s countless lakes, the shimmer of clear waters, and the long-standing traditions of fishing. Imagine yourself in the gentle warmth of a lakeside sauna, watching the evening sun sink behind the islands as boats glide silently across the calm water. As twilight settles over the lake, the scene invites you to slow down, breathe in the stillness, and experience the peaceful rhythm of Finnish lake life — the very essence that inspired the Järvi Fillet.

Every detail of the knife is designed to reflect this harmony between nature and craftsmanship. The handle combines dark, heat-treated curly birch with bright, stainless steel fittings. Natural materials and meticulous finishing create a harmonious composition where traditional craftsmanship meets modern design.
The reflective laser engravings on the blade and bolster highlight subtle details and enhance the knife’s elegant character.
and comes in a genuine black leather sheath, decorated with a lake-inspired pattern printed in blue foil.

name: Lake whisperer
description: This unique knife is inspired by a tranquil lake. The gray sky reflects off the water's surface, and just a few ripples from the wind make the blue water appear like a whisper. The blade is 6 cm of Damascus steel, where you can see waves as if something is breaking the water's surface. The handle is made of reindeer antler, bordered by plywood pieces in various shades of blue, creating the impression of a whisper. The sheath is genuine leather.

name: Rooki
lead: Handmade - Since 1928
description: Rooki is a Lappish word, meaning a spotted reindeer – a rare and distinctive creature. Its unique coat pattern sets it apart from the herd, making it truly special. In the same way, the Rooki knife embodies individuality and uniqueness: its materials, shape, and patterns distinguish it from all others, creating an exceptionally rare piece of Marttiini's Unique collection.

These Unique by Marttiini knives are some of the most prestigious knives we have ever made, each knife is a unique piece. These knives are designed to be elegant and beautiful collector's items. Our skilled professionals have made this knife using exclusive materials selected solely for this knife.

At Marttiini, we have a long history with traditional materials from Finland, such as curly birch and reindeer antler bone. On these Unique knives, we combine these traditional materials in various ways to create a special design for each Unique knife.

The Damascus blade is made by combining two different types of steel in thin layers. The blade has 120 steel layers that have been welded together under extreme pressure and heat. The result is a beautifully patterned, stainless and very hard blade (HRC 60) that stays sharp even in extended use.
Every Unique by Marttiini knife is a one of a kind. They represent the beauty and toughness of the North.

In the stand, the knives are kept separate from each other, which helps them stay sharp longer. After hand washing, the knives can be dried in this white beech stand. The knives remain sharp and in a good condition for longer, if stored in this block.
The set contains five knives: peeling, vegetable, filleting, bread and cook's knives.(Products: 740114, 745114, 757114, 765114 ja 770114)

name: Suomi-Finland
description: The roots of the Suomi-Finland knife reach back more than 20 years. When Finland celebrated 80 years of independence in 1997, Marttiini naturally marked the occasion by crafting a special knife. In 2009, the design was refined to give it an even more distinguished appearance.

At the end of the handle is the Finnish Lion, cast in metal, symbolizing the strong spirit of Finnish perseverance with which our forefathers secured the nation’s independence. The Lion is also stamped on the sheath as a proud emblem of Finnish heritage.
This knife is delivered in a wooden gift box

This knife is delivered in a wooden gift box. The popular Bear knife is a great gift or an impressive knife for regular use.

name: Cabin Chef Knife Set
lead: The Cabin Chef set – Design inspired by northern nature, powered by form and function
description: The Cabin Chef set, designed by Harri Koskinen, has the essential knives for the camping and cabin kitchen. The meticulously clean lines of the knives are designed to serve function and ergonomics. The harmonious combination of beautiful design and practicality, as well as durable natural materials, guarantee that the Cabin Chef knives are a pleasure to use, time and time again.

The rounded square profile of the handle are designed to accommodate different grips required for different ingredients. The handles are made of Finnish thermally modified birch – a material known for its durability and graceful aging as well as warm and pleasant feel grip. The matte finish ensures a safe grip even when wet.
The blades are made of high-quality, durable stainless steel with the utmost precision for the specific use of each knife.

The set includes a chef knife, a filleting knife, a fish fork, two smaller knives and a sharpening stone wrapped in a leather knife roll. The Cabin Chef knives are available individually or as a set. The set does not include sheaths.
We recommend hand wash.

name: Condor Big Game
description: This hunting and hiking knife is specifically designed for a firm grip. Its 13 cm long blade is made of matte-polished chrome steel, ensuring excellent durability. The knife is competitively priced compared to similar models, but the quality remains equally high. The rubber handle provides a secure grip even when your hands are wet.

name: Mushroom Knife Kerääjä
description: In Finnish language the word ‘’kerääjä’’ means gatherer. The premium heat-treated birch handle is turned in a direction counter to the blade's grinding. This design facilitates a more comfortable grip, drawing inspiration from the inward movement most common in mushroom foraging.

The curved shape of the blade facilitates smooth slicing through the stem, preserving the integrity of the underlying fungal mycelium and preventing any disruption to its growth. The blade is made of high end stainless steel used in high quality kitchen knives.

The brush is firm enough to remove dirt, debris and bugs, but soft enough to avoid damaging delicate mushrooms. It is made of natural animal hair. The knife comes in a genuine, chrome tanned matte brown leather sheath with silver foil debossing. The quick fix attachment belt makes it easy to attach the sheath to various places like the belt, belt loop, wrist or basket handle. Eyelet rivets offer an option to use a lanyard for example.

name: Herb Knife Kerääjä
description: In Finnish language the word ‘’kerääjä’’ means gatherer. The holes on the blade are meant for removing the leaves of smaller herbs like rosemary, peppermint or even basil. Serrated edge and the hook can be used for harvesting stronger and bigger herbs and plants. The size of the hook is perfect for cutting lupine plant for example.

The blade is made of high end stainless steel used in high quality kitchen knives. The premium heat-treated birch handle is comfortable to use in both hands and in both ways, whatever edge of the blade you might be using. The knife comes in a genuine, chrome tanned matte brown leather sheath with silver foil debossing.
The quick fix attachment belt makes it easy to attach the sheath to various places like the belt, belt loop, wrist or basket handle. Eyelet rivets offer an option to use a lanyard for example.

name: Chopping Board Small
description: Crafted from high-quality oak wood, this chopping board combines timeless design with exceptional durability, making it an essential addition to any kitchen. The natural strength of oak ensures long-lasting performance, while its elegant grain pattern adds a touch of rustic charm. Gentle on knives, it helps maintain sharpness, and as a naturally hygienic material, oak’s porous structure and tannins help reduce bacterial survival compared to many other surfaces.

The cutting board should be washed with clean water after use, as soap is not recommended. If soap is applied, the washing should be done quickly, followed by careful rinsing and immediate drying with a clean cloth. To keep the board in the best condition, avoid placing it in a dishwasher. Over time, the surface may lose some of its original finish; in this case, a new layer of coating can be applied. For the best results, it is recommended to use Rubio Monocoat Oilplus 2c, which is the same protective treatment originally applied in the factory.

description: Soft Handle Hunting knife combines a smoothly contoured handle that provides a comfortable grip with a 13 cm long chrome blade which ensures excellent usability in various applications. The knife is specifically designed for hunting, but it is also well-suited for hiking and fishing.

name: Wild Boar
description: The butt of the knife features a wild boar head on a cast ferrule. The curly birch handle with a finger groove is color-waxed to withstand use and ensure a good grip. The razor-sharp blade is made of durable stainless steel.
The knife comes in an elegant wooden box, making it a perfect gift.

name: Salmon Knife
description: This design knife is an impressive collector’s item and a reliable tool. Stainless steel is an excellent material for regular use – the material stays rust-free and sharp for a long time. Thermal treatment of the curly birch wood gives the handle a good protection against moisture.
This knife is delivered in a wooden gift box.

properties.name: Handle material
properties.value: heat treated curly birch, waxed, cast ferrules

name: Antler Damascus
lead: The Antler Damascus – the crown jewel of Marttiini knives
description: The Antler Damascus is the most prestigious knife we have ever made, since the establishment of our knife factory in 1928. It is the tour de force of knifemaking by our skilled professionals. The Antler Damascus has been carefully handcrafted using materials selected exclusively for this knife.

The ultra-sharp blade is made of stainless Damascus steel. Damascus steel is crafted using technology in which two different top-grade steels are embedded together in 120 layers under high pressure and high temperature. Interlaying two different steels and using the traditional blacksmith techniques of forging, hammering and rolling in the right temperatures brings out the beautiful rose pattern. The Damascus blade is extremely durable and stays sharp for a long time.

The rock-solid handle of the knife is made of Finnish moose antler. The handle has been elaborated by hand, which requires strong craftsmanship skills. The color of the antler is natural, no chemical whitening has been used. The cast ferrule imitates the rose pattern of the blade.
Each of the Antler Damascus knife blades is individually numbered, making the knife not only a practical tool for the outdoors but also a unique collector’s item.
Each knife is delivered in an elegant wooden gift box.

name: Damascus
description: The blade of the Marttiini Damascus knife is from stainless Damascus steel, where, by means of special technology two different top-grade steels are combined into 120 layers. The interlayering of the two different steels and the highly specialised machining bring out the beautiful pattern on the blade.
The handle of the knife is made of Finnish curly birch, and the ferrules are cast. The beautiful pattern on the blade is echoed on the ferrule at the end of the handle.
Marttiini Damascus knives are numbered by the production year, making each knife is a unique collector's item.
Each knife is delivered in an elegant wooden gift box.

name: Wild Reindeer 13
description: The versatile Wild Reindeer 13 is a reliable all-around knife for outdoor enthusiasts. The Lynx blade, with a blood groove and a slightly upturned blade tip, is an iconic Marttiini blade model, developed in the ’30s by Janne Marttiini himself. The stainless steel blade (1.4034, HRC 53,5-55) delivers durability while the shaped handle offers a firm grip.

name: Wild Reindeer 11
description: The Marttiini Wild Reindeer 11 is a beautiful and versatile general-purpose knife that reflects the charm of northern nature. It is an iconic Marttiini blade model, developed in the ’30s by Janne Marttiini himself. The knife features a lynx blade with a blood groove and a slightly upturned tip hook, making it an excellent reliable tool for wilderness trips.

The stainless-steel blade delivers durability while the shaped handle offers a firm grip. The handle is made from Finnish curly birch and reindeer antler, ensuring a good grip and making each knife unique. The reindeer antler pattern on the handle brings a touch of northern charm. The name “Pailakka” means untamed male reindeer, symbolizing its strong and durable nature. The sheath is made of leather, adding to the knife’s practicality and elegance.

name: Eagle Damascus
lead: Impressive Eagle Damascus Knife in a wooden gift box
description: The Marttiini Eagle Damascus Knife combines three beautiful and durable materials – Damascus steel, heat-treated Finnish curly birch, and cast ferrules.

Damascus steel is a highly valued material among knife enthusiasts. It consists of 120 layers of two different steels, forged together under high pressure and heat. This process creates an exceptionally hard blade (HRC 60) with a distinctive flowing pattern. The Damascus steel blade retains its sharpness for a long time.
Eagle Damascus knives are individually numbered. The knife is delivered in wooden gift boxes.

properties.name: Blade material
properties.value: Stainless Damascus steel blade RWL34 & PMC27, HRC 60

name: Lumberjack Antler
lead: Beauty and uncompromising functionality
description: Looking for a reliable all-around knife to accompany you on your hiking trips? Look no further – the Lumberjack Antler's got your back. The carbon steel blade is easy to keep razor-sharp, while the heat-treated birch handle brings a breath of warmth to the design. Finished with reindeer antler for that feel of Northern mysticism.

name: Tundra CB
lead: The Tundra is a tough performer
description: The Tundra is a full-blooded bushcraft all-round knife for the demanding user. This bushcraft knife is designed for heavy-duty use. Made of of high-strength stainless steel, the full tang structure and robust blade provide excellent durability. The blade and the full tang are 3.5 mm thick.
On this knife, traditional materials go hand in hand with modern design. The handle is made of Finnish curly birch. The red details on the handle and leather sheath seal the dynamic look.
The Tundra knife is available with two handle options: deadwood-like, gray-waxed curly birch
and natural-colored, waxed curly birch (Tundra CB). The surface of the waxed wood and the design of the handle ensure a firm grip. The sturdy leather sheath is reinforced with rivets.
If needed, the knife handle parts can be re-tightened. The screw has a Torx T10 head.

name: Lumberjack Stainless
lead: Easy-to-maintain hiker's general-purpose knife
description: Based on one of the most popular Marttiini knives, the Lynx Lumberjack Carbon, this version is made from easy-to-maintain stainless steel.
The handle is made of stained birch. Its surface is slightly textured so you easily get a firm, safe grip of the knife.

name: Lumberjack Carbon
description: The blade is made of carbon steel that is perfect for carving and is easy to re-sharpen to its original sharpness. Remember to take proper care of your carbon steel knife: always dry the blade carefully after each use and oil the blade with unsalted oil on a regular basis. This will ensure your knife will serve you loyally from one year to the next.
The handle of this knife is made from stained birch. Its surface is slightly textured so you easily get a firm, safe grip of the knife.
This knife is also available with a stainless steel blade (

name: Kaamos Carbon
description: The handle is made of stained birch. Its surface is slightly textured so you easily get a firm, safe grip of the knife.

The blade is made of carbon steel that is perfect for carving and is easy to re-sharpen to its original sharpness. Remember to take proper care of your carbon steel knife. Always dry the blade carefully after each use and oil the blade with unsalted oil on a regular basis. This will ensure your knife will serve you loyally from one year to the next.

name: Condor Junior
description: The safe rounded tip protects junior carvers from puncture wounds and tip cuts. The blade is made from easy to maintain stainless steel. The sharpening of the blade is naturally the same as in the knives of more experienced carvers.
Roughened rubber handle and finger guard ensure a firm grip of the knife. The handle fits into the hand of a child also by its size. And a proper knife certainly comes with the proper leather sheath.

name: Marttiini Hiking axe
lead: Split firewood with a Marttiini Axe.
description: Our axe series follow the example set by Marttiini knives.
We combined modern technology with traditional handicraft. The result is a family of three durable and reliable axes.
For materials, we chose quality carbon steel, beautiful ash wood and timeless leather.
The Marttiini Hiking Axe is the most lightweight in the series. It is easy to carry with during longer hikes. Blade: 300 g.

name: Marttiini Trekking Axe
lead: Split firewood with a Marttiini Axe.
description: Our axe series follow the example set by Marttiini knives.
We combined modern technology with traditional handicraft. The result is a family of three durable and reliable axes.
The Trekking Axe have more sturdy and shaped handle. They ensure a safe grip. The blade is heavier, which makes the Trekking Axe great for bigger tasks as well. Blade 500 g.
For materials, we chose quality carbon steel, beautiful ash wood and timeless leather.

name: Marttiini Camping Axe
lead: Split firewood with a Marttiini Axe.
description: Our axe series follow the example set by Marttiini knives.
We combined modern technology with traditional handicraft. The result is a family of three durable and reliable axes.
The Camping Axe have more sturdy and shaped handle. They ensure a safe grip. The blade is heavier, which makes the Camping Axe great for bigger tasks as well. Blade: 600 g.
For materials, we chose quality carbon steel, beautiful ash wood and timeless leather.

name: Snappy
description: The 6 cm long carbon steel blade is handy in use and easy to keep sharp. The handle shape follows the traditional Marttiini Lynx handle. Birch handle with waxed finish gives you a good grip on the knife. Black leather sheath with printed Marttiini logo pattern.

name: Tundra GR
lead: The Tundra is a tough performer
description: The Tundra is a full-blooded bushcraft all-round knife for the demanding user. This bushcraft knife is designed for heavy-duty use. Made of of high-strength stainless steel, the full tang structure and robust blade provide excellent durability. The blade and the full tang are 3.5 mm thick.
On this knife, traditional materials go hand in hand with modern design. The handle is made of Finnish curly birch. The red details on the handle and leather sheath seal the dynamic look.
The Tundra knife is available with two handle options: deadwood-like, gray-waxed curly birch (Tundra GR) and natural-colored, waxed curly birch
. The surface of the waxed wood and the design of the handle ensure a firm grip. The sturdy leather sheath is reinforced with rivets.
If needed, the knife handle parts can be re-tightened. The screw has a Torx T10 head.

name: Mushroom Knife
description: The Marttiini mushroom knife features a handy cleaning brush at the end of the handle for neatly removing any debris from the mushrooms. The blade is exactly the right shape and length for cutting delicate mushrooms. The knife is designed to be totally practical and it is supplied with a leather sheath to be kept in the pocket or on the belt.

name: Mushroom Knife (neck sheath)
description: The Marttiini mushroom knife features a handy cleaning brush at the end of the handle for neatly removing any debris from the mushrooms. The blade is exactly the right shape and length for cutting delicate mushrooms.

The sheath of this knife can be easily hung from the neck. The strap includes a safety mechanism, which opens the strap when it becomes entangled. It also includes a handy clip for attaching the knife to a jacket so that it will not be in the way when stooping to pick mushrooms.

name: Arctic Circle Knife
description: Marttiini's northern history was the inspiration for this knife. The light coloured sheath and handle are inspired by our bright summer nights and the dark winter months are represented by the dark blade. Lapland is indeed a land of contrasts.

The blade is made of carbon steel that is perfect for carving and is easy to re-sharpen to its original sharpness. Remember to take proper care of your carbon steel knife: always dry the blade carefully after each use and oil the blade with unsalted oil on a regular basis. This will ensure your knife will serve you loyally from one year to the next.

name: Ranger
description: Marttiini Ranger is a robust and reliable wilderness knife that cuts, carves and even splits firewood. The handle combines the colors of Finnish curly birch and thermally heated birch. The strong Lapp knife blade is made of stainless steel and is designed in accordance to ancient Lapp knife principles.

name: Condor Frontier
description: This large knife is the perfect choice for users with big hands. Its rubber handle provides an excellent grip, even when wearing gloves, and the finger guard adds extra safety. The rubber handle also feels comfortable in cold winter weather. This knife is ideal for both hunters and hikers. The blade is made of stainless steel with a Martef coating and is 13 cm long.

name: Condor Trailblazer
description: Hunting and Outdoor knife. The dirt and moisture repelling Martef coating reduces friction.
Safe rubber handle with finger guard.

name: Mushroom Knife Ruska
description: In Finnish language the word ‘ruska’ is used to describe the beginning of autumn when the leaves change to bright colours like red, yellow and orange. It’s also the best time for mushroom foraging.

Bright red handle makes it easier to find the knife in the nature, as it might sometimes get lost. The shape of the curved blade enables smooth slicing of the stem without affecting or uprooting the underlying fungi mycelium. The brush is stiff enough to remove dirt, debris and bugs, but soft enough to not damage the mushrooms. The knife comes in a genuine, chrome tanned matte black leather sheath with silver foil de-bossing. The elastic attachment cord makes it easy to attach the sheath to various places like the belt, belt loop, wrist or the basket handle.

name: Little Condor
lead: A handy small knife
description: The textured rubber handle and finger guard ensure a firm grip of the knife. The blade is made of easy to maintain stainless steel. The handle is designed to fit the hand of a youngster, but the knife is a handy tool for adults for carving and work that requires precision.

name: Condor Trailblazer and Firestick
lead: Condor Trailblazer
description: Essential products for hiking conveniently in one package! The knife and fire starters come together in a cardboard gift box at a special price. The Pioneer knife is made of coated stainless steel and features a comfortable rubber handle. The fire starters provide extra security, as they work even when wet, in case matches get soaked.
(185018T) Hunting and Outdoor knife. The dirt and moisture repelling Martef coating reduces friction. Safe rubber handle with finger guard.

(1516110) If your matches get wet or you run out of lighter fluid, you can always get a fire going with it. Our fire stick provides a hot spark even in the most severe weather conditions. Just pull the striker or the back of your knife firmly down the length of the stick and direct the sparks towards you tinder. Any dry material like wood chips and moss will do the trick. Enjoy your campfire!

name: Kiehinen
description: The blade is made of traditional carbon steel that is perfect for carving wood, and easy to re-sharpen to its original sharpness when needed.
The handle is made of Finnish curly birch and the knife is protected with a beautiful natural coloured leather sheath.
This knife is suitable for the daily use of both campers and craftsmen as well as for fishermen and hunters.

name: Condor Timberjack (plastic sheath)
description: The blade of the Timberjack is made of carbon steel, which is perfect for carving, and is easy to resharpen when required. Remember to take proper care of your carbon steel knife. Always dry the blade carefully after each use and oil the blade with unsalted oil on a regular basis. This will ensure your knife will serve you loyally from one year to the next.
The textured rubber handle and the finger guard ensure a safe and firm grip of the knife in the most demanding conditions. This knife is supplied with a practical plastic sheath.

Always dry the blade carefully after each use and oil the blade with unsalted oil on a regular basis. This will ensure your knife will serve you loyally from one year to the next.
The textured rubber handle and the finger guard ensure a safe and firm grip of the knife in the most demanding conditions. This knife is supplied with a leather sheath.
